Uses of Class
gameState.GameBoardHex

  • Packages that use GameBoardHex 
    Package Description
    gameManager
    The next set of classes to be described is the Game Manager Classes, it isn’t as much of a set of classes but simply a singular class.
    gameState
    The Game State is the meat of the Model for this version of the Model View Controller architecture.
    player
    The player sub system contains classes for Players and Robots, both of which have a single field which is their list of robots.
    units
    The units module is used to represent a “game piece” from the RoboSports board game.

    • Uses of GameBoardHex in gameManager

      Methods in gameManager with parameters of type GameBoardHex 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GameManager.move(int currentPlayerTurn, GameBoardHex dest)
      Move the current Unit of the current player from that Unit's current position to the position 'dest'.
      void GameManager.shootTarget(int currentPlayerTurn, GameBoardHex clickedHex)
      Attempt to shoot the clickedHex with the current Player's current Robot.

    • Uses of GameBoardHex in gameState

      Fields in gameState declared as GameBoardHex 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private GameBoardHex[][] GameBoard.myHexes
      2d array storing the hexes according to row and col, if there is no hex, it is NULL
      Methods in gameState that return GameBoardHex 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameBoardHex GameBoard.getHexAtIndex(int i, int j)
      Returns the hex at the wanted position
      GameBoardHex GameBoard.getHexFromPosition(Position p)
      get the gameBoardHex from position
      GameBoardHex GameBoard.getHexOfUnitFromRobotNumber(Position pOfUnit, int range, int absoluteDir, int robotDir)
      Return the position relative to the absolute direction of the system
      GameBoardHex GameBoard.getHexUsingPixels(int x, int y, int translateX, int translateY, int hexSize)
      get hex using pixel position
